modify.from sentence: In this work , we first modify the popular one - stage RetinaNet method to perform face detection as our baseline model .

namely.from sentence: Then some recent tricks are applied on this baseline to develop a high performance face detector namely AInnoFace :

Using.from sentence: ( 1 ) Employing the two - step classification and regression for detection ; ( 2 ) Applying the Intersection over Union ( IoU ) loss function for regression ; ( 3 ) Revisiting the data augmentation based on data - anchor - sampling for training ; ( 4 ) Utilizing the max - out operation for robuster classification ; ( 5 ) Using the multi-scale testing strategy for inference .
